headline: Spinoffs Outperforming the S&P 500 Boost the Case for Breakups
summary: (Bloomberg) -- The pace of spinoffs in the US is set to accelerate in 2025, and if history is any guide, the newly created companies are poised to deliver solid returns for investors, according to a report from Trivariate Research.Most Read from BloombergIs This Weird Dome the Future of Watching Sports?NYC’s Subway Violence Deters Drive to Bring Workers Back to OfficeDon’t Shrink the BusNYC Congestion Pricing to Take Effect After Years of DelaysNYC Congestion Pricing Takes Effect After Years of
